pageContext.claim: “Fox Poll say best Economy in DECADES!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump touts one element of a poll that mostly had bad news for him. More voters rate the economy positively today than have since 2001, but otherwise the president was underwater on every other major issue: Health care: 38% approve, 51% disapprove; Border security: 44% approve, 52% disapprove; Immigration: 41% approve, 54% disapprove; Trade: 40% approve, 49% disapprove; North Korea: 39% approve, 49% disapprove; Iran: 39% approve 46% disapprove; Race relations: 32% approve, 57% disapprove. Moreover, when asked for their economic prediction if Trump is reelected, 33% said conditions would get better, 26% said it would stay the same and 39% said it would get worse.
